## CI & CD

### ci.yml
no secret required ðŸ¥³

### cd.yml

ðŸ«¡ Don't forget to create secrets with keys:


| Name             | Key                        |
|------------------|----------------------------|
| HOST (SERVER IP) | DEPLOYMENT_SERVER_HOST     |
| USERNAME SSH     | DEPLOYMENT_SERVER_USER     |
| PASSWORD SSH     | DEPLOYMENT_SERVER_PASSWORD |
